relevant_findings.description: Soviet KGB officer Nikolay Stepanovych Leonov traveling from Mexico City to Brussels
relevant_findings.direct_quote: NIKOLAY STEPANOVYCH LEONOV, SECOND SECY KK (PRESS ATTACHE), SOVEMB MEXICO CITY ACCOMPANIED BY DAUGHTER IRINA WAS SCHEDULED DEPART MEXICO CITY 29 JUNE SABENA FLT 556 FOR BRUSSELS
relevant_findings.significance: Provides insight into Soviet diplomatic movements during the post-assassination period, potentially revealing intelligence community activities

relevant_findings.description: Detailed travel itinerary of Soviet KGB officer
relevant_findings.direct_quote: LEONOV KGB OFFICER REPORTEDLY ON WAY MOSCOW FOR 20-DAY TDY. PLS CONFIRM ARRIVAL BRUSSELS AND DEPARTURE, PRESUMABLY NEXT AEROFLOT FLIGHT TO MOSCOW
relevant_findings.significance: Tracks Soviet intelligence officer's movements, suggests ongoing diplomatic/intelligence activities in the mid-1960s
